text: The articles or bylaws may provide for the holding of meetings by units of the membership and may provide for a method of transmitting the votes there cast to the central meeting, or for a method of representation by the election of delegates to the central meeting, or for a combination of both of these methods.
historical:

1981 Ed., § 29-1112.

1973 Ed., § 29-812.

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Editor's Notes

Former § 29-912 has been recodified as § 29A-912.

DC CODE § 29-912

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Meetings; regular and special--Units of membership.
